TopicTitle: new cheat menu appears off screen

Articles.Content: Just got For Science!  There's a new cheat mode that's very exciting.  Alt+F8.  The problem is that it shows up at the far right side of my screen, mostly off the screen.  I can't use it or move it to somewhere that I can see the whole thing.  I'm playing on a laptop with just an intel iRIS GPU, so maybe that has something to do with it.  Any ideas?
